question:
In context with recently released report of World Economic Outlook, which of the following statements are correct?
  1. There has been dip in the global economic growth from previous years.
  2. US-China Trade war has been considered as one of the major reasons for the dip.
  3. Report was released by World Bank.
Select the correct option from the given below:
explanation:
IMF has recently released the report World Economic Outlook. It has projected the global economic growth at 3.3% in 2019, down from 3.6% in 2018 and 4% in 2017 (2). IMF Chief Economist Gita Gopinathan has informed the press about the update and content of the report. The reasons mentioned for the dip are:
  • 1 US-China trade tensions
  • 2 Macro-economic stress in Turkey and Argentina
  • 3 Tighter credit policies in China and financial tightening
  • 4 Geo-political tensions in Venezuela with USA, Bolivia, Russia
